gui.blue_skies.item.ability.dusk.0: Grants invisibility while sneaking with smoke.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.dusk.1: Grants invisibility while sneaking with reduced smoke.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.dusk.2: Grants invisibility while sneaking without smoke.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.dusk.3: Grants invisibility and hides armor while sneaking without smoke.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.poison.0: [DISABLED] Increases damage dealt by 1 when poisoned.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.poison.1: [DISABLED] Increases damage dealt by 2 when poisoned.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.poison.2: [DISABLED] Increases damage dealt by 3 when poisoned.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.poison.3: [DISABLED] Increases damage dealt by 4 when poisoned.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.aquatic.2: Grants a 20%% swim speed increase, and decreases burn time at double the speed.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.aquatic.3: Grants a 20%% swim speed increase, and decreases burn time at triple the speed.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.life.0: Decreased fire damage when at 2 hearts or lower.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.life.1: Decreased fire damage when at 4 hearts or lower.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.life.2: Decreased fire damage when at 6 hearts or lower.
gui.blue_skies.item.ability.life.3: Decreased fire damage when at 6 hearts or lower. Has a chance to remove negative potion effects.
